


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.is -->
<!-- @name    isFirefox -->

# ```js isFirefox ```


Detect if is firefox

## Parameters

- **ua** (navigator.userAgent) String: The user agent on which to make the test



## Example (js)

```js
import isFirefox from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/firefox'
if (isFirefox()) {
  // do something cool
}
```
